flow-definition.description:
Used to start to finish (assuming no errors) install OpenStack Ansible, run tests, upgrade via OSA upgrade script to ${to_release}, run tests, parse and report results.
Default parameters assume upgrade from stable/mitaka to stable/newton with full rebuild and redeploy of all nodes in environment.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: to_release
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Version of Openstack to upgrade to

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: rebuild_environment
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Used to rebuild environment from clean image. Defaults to True.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: controller_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Specifies controller node to be used to install/run tests on utility container. Default is 'controller01', which would result in all tests to be installed, configured, and run from the LXC container of 'controller01_utility_container' on controller01.
Should be left at default unless rerunning tests by installing/configuring tests for existing environment through installing on different controller.
